info.title: Alpaca Wrapper
info.description:
All endpoints require the `X-API-Key` header; the `api_key` query parameter is
supported as a compatibility fallback. The service propagates Alpaca's rate
limits as HTTP 429 responses and surfaces the upstream `Retry-After` header.
When `extended_hours` is enabled the order payload must remain a DAY limit
order, include `limit_price`, and omit advanced `order_class` values.

post.summary: Review proposed Alpaca orders with GPT-5
post.description: Use GPT-5 Structured Output to review proposed orders and return a JSON execution plan with adjustments and risk notes.

parameters.name: stream

schema.description: Stream the GPT analysis via server-sent events when true.
schema.title: Stream

parameters.description: Stream the GPT analysis via server-sent events when true.

get.description: Surface the prompt template identifiers and versions used by the edge service.

detail.description: Explanation of the rate limit condition.
Error message explaining why the request is unauthorized.

post.description:
Submit an order via Alpaca's `/v2/orders`.

Requires `X-API-Key`, forwards 429 responses with `Retry-After`, and
applies the limit guard (extended-hours must be DAY limit orders).

detail.description: Error message explaining why the request is unauthorized.
Error message explaining why the request is unauthorized.

parameters.name: client_order_id

schema.description: Client order identifier as documented in Alpaca Trading API (Oct 2025).
schema.title: Client Order Id

parameters.description: Client order identifier as documented in Alpaca Trading API (Oct 2025).

delete.description: Cancel a specific order by id.

detail.description: Error message explaining why the request is unauthorized.
Error message explaining why the request is unauthorized.

Response Get Trades V2 V2 Trades Get

dtbp_check.title: Dtbp Check
dtbp_check.description: Day-trade buying power check enforcement (none, entry, exit, both).

no_shorting.title: No Shorting
no_shorting.description: Disable all short sales when true.

suspend_trade.title: Suspend Trade
suspend_trade.description: If true, new orders are blocked at the account level.

trade_confirm_email.title: Trade Confirm Email
trade_confirm_email.description: Email preference for order confirmations (all, none, trade_activity).

pdt_check.title: Pdt Check
pdt_check.description: Pattern day trading check behaviour (enforced, bypassed, entry_only).

order_type.title: Order Type
order_type.description: Order type, e.g. market or limit.

time_in_force.title: Time In Force
time_in_force.description: Time-in-force directive such as day or gtc.

notional.title: Notional
notional.description: Target notional in USD when quantity is omitted.

limit_price.title: Limit Price
limit_price.description: Limit price for limit or stop-limit orders.

stop_price.title: Stop Price
stop_price.description: Top-level stop price for standalone stop or stop-limit orders.

trail_price.title: Trail Price
trail_price.description: Trailing stop price (ignored unless type is trailing_stop).

trail_percent.title: Trail Percent
trail_percent.description: Trailing stop percentage (ignored unless type is trailing_stop).

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional human context about the order intent.

field.title: Field
field.description: Order field to adjust, e.g. limit_price.

suggested_value.title: Suggested Value
suggested_value.description: Suggested replacement value, expressed as a string.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Short natural-language summary of the guidance.

risk_flags.title: Risk Flags
risk_flags.description: Risks or guardrails to call out.

include_account.title: Include Account
include_account.description: Include Alpaca account snapshot in the analysis context.

include_positions.title: Include Positions
include_positions.description: Include open positions to highlight sizing overlaps.

include_open_orders.title: Include Open Orders
include_open_orders.description: Include currently open orders to detect duplicates.

risk_notes.title: Risk Notes
risk_notes.description: Additional risk or compliance constraints for the model to respect.

prompt.description: Optional reusable prompt template reference for the GPT call.

execution_ready.title: Execution Ready
execution_ready.description: Whether the orders can be sent as-is.

plan_summary.title: Plan Summary
plan_summary.description: Overall synopsis of the execution plan.

follow_up_tasks.title: Follow Up Tasks
follow_up_tasks.description: Actionable next steps for the assistant or trader.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Default variables supplied with the prompt template.

order_plan.description: Metadata describing the order-plan prompt template.

id.title: Id
id.description: Prompt template identifier registered with OpenAI.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Optional variable substitutions to inject into the prompt template.

stop_price.title: Stop Price
stop_price.description: Trigger price for the stop-loss child leg (e.g., 225.0).

limit_price.title: Limit Price
limit_price.description: Optional limit price for a stop-limit child leg. Omit to use a market stop; set slightly below the stop (e.g., 224.0) when a limit is required.

limit_price.title: Limit Price
limit_price.description: Limit price for the take-profit child leg.

status.title: Status
status.description: Current order status reported by Alpaca.
